subject: Re: [junit] F****** Kama Sutra pics
msgSnippet: ... I like this suggestion, and if there are 6000 registered on the list, appoint a dozen or so more moderators for a few weeks, and as the need for moderation
messageBody:
On 6/5/06, Cédric Beust ♔ <cbeust@...> wrote:
>
> Good luck identifying Windows users out of 6000+ users...
>
> My suggestion: make the entire list fully moderated for a few weeks. The
> traffic is super low anyway, it won't be that much work for the
> moderators.
>
> After a few weeks, restore it to "moderate first-time posters only".
>
> --
> Cedric
> http://testng.org
>

I like this suggestion,

and if there are 6000 registered on the list, appoint a dozen or so more
moderators for a few weeks, and as the need for moderation drops, lay off, I
mean work force manage the excess moderators.

- Dan


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
